keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap f
unmap <a-f>
unmap i
unmap u
unmap <a-p> # conflict with vivaldi's open settings

map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp

map i LinkHints.activateMode
map I LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <C-i> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <A-i> LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map yi LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

map 0 firstTab
map 'f firstTab
map $ lastTab
map 'l lastTab
map u restoreTab
map # visitPreviousTab
map '# visitPreviousTab
map 'a visitPreviousTab
map 'd removeTab
map <C-w>o closeOtherTabs
map <a-h> moveTabLeft
map <a-l> moveTabRight

map <C-p> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map <C-space> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
#map <space>; Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
#map <space>t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
#g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
 yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
